name: A.P.E. - Animal Parasite Epidemic
description:
The year is 20XX. All over the now quarantined state of Monkansas, your primate pals have become infected with a new parasite that's making them hungry for monkey... You play as the heroic Doctor Monkey, shooting BananX at your fallen comrades to cure them.

Controls

WASD to walk, R to reload, point and left click to shoot

Assets came from Kenney Game Assets and Mr Mo on unity. Textures and logo made by RavenHaven.

Made by Jarf Gablam Studios.
